bwwExcerpt: The moments of pixie-dusted perfection come from Paulus' mind-especially one visually breathtaking moment of swirling, sparkled sadness. When my seven year-old companion (yes, families-this one's kid-friendly) asked upon leaving the matinee, 'Can we go back tonight?' I thought of one of Sylvia's lines: 'You know children. They don't mince their words.' B+
